name: yfiles-documentation-viewer
description: Offline installation of the yFiles Documentation Viewer

scripts.download-font-awesome: download --out offline/fontawesome/css --filename font-awesome.min.css https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.4.0/css/font-awesome.min.css && download --out offline/fontawesome/fonts --filename fontawesome-webfont.woff2 https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.4.0/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.woff2
scripts.postinstall: npm run download-source-sans-pro && npm run download-font-awesome && npm run download-ecma5Defs && npm run download-browserDefs && npm run download-editor-bundle
